channel.title: Comments on: Questions Couples Should Ask Before Marrying – by New York Times
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... turns out I already had porn before on the blog. I didn't remember and didn't even think to look :)
item.content:encoded: Hehe… turns out I already had porn before on the blog. I didn’t remember and didn’t even think to look :)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: Do you think the 'h1' tag is visible?
item.content:encoded: Do you think the ‘h1’ tag is visible?

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
<b>PORN</b>
ha, now you should be listed on the top of google
item.content:encoded:
PORN

ha, now you should be listed on the top of google

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... good one. Also - now the word porn is associated with my name on Google. Thanks :)
item.content:encoded:
Hehe… good one.
Also – now the word porn is associated with my name on Google. Thanks :)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: "You know what honey, let's both compromise. I'll agree that you'll put the 42 LCD in the bedroom if you'll accept my every other night beer with my friends. You know what, even more; I agree that you'll sign up for all the cable's channels, and if you insist even porn. You see how much I love you and willing to make you happy." Do you understand now why it is a key issue?
item.content:encoded: “You know what honey, let’s both compromise. I’ll agree that you’ll put the 42 LCD in the bedroom if you’ll accept my every other night beer with my friends. You know what, even more; I agree that you’ll sign up for all the cable’s channels, and if you insist even porn. You see how much I love you and willing to make you happy.” Do you understand now why it is a key issue?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: It is, but I still wouldn't expect it to be a crucial question to ask. I mean, if you can't compromise on that in some way - you might as well get the divorce papers ready. Now that I think about it - I guess it's a good indicator :)
item.content:encoded: It is, but I still wouldn’t expect it to be a crucial question to ask. I mean, if you can’t compromise on that in some way – you might as well get the divorce papers ready. Now that I think about it – I guess it’s a good indicator :)

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: Isn't it part of the American way of living?
item.content:encoded: Isn’t it part of the American way of living?
